item.title: Shiny app: Interprovincial mobility of journeypersons in Canada
item.description: I made this interactive visualization tool based on Shiny. It presents the data (Statistics Canada Table 37-10-0204-01) in a nice Chord diagram. Please not that this is not an official product from StatCan. English version La version française All programs are available on this GitHub repository.

item.title: Canadian Apprenticeship Registrations and Certifications: Interactive Tool
item.description: This is a Power BI-based data visualization tool I made. Check out at Statistics Canada’s website: English version La version française Many teams at StatCan publish a lot of interesting interative tools, which appear not very well-known.
